title: Flipped Learning-Based Stress Management Strategy Design for Pharmacy Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic stress concept comprehension and pharmaceutical education experience
context.additional_context: Program for pharmacy-focused secondary students needing stress awareness and coping skills in post-COVID-19 learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose stress awareness levels at 80% or higher based on materials provided through the flipped learning approach
Learners can concretely propose three or more stress coping strategies through peer feedback and case analysis
Learners can establish personalized stress management plans through project-based assessments and demonstrate feasibility at 70% or higher

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
